name: Sales Invoice Income & Expense
query:
select
	`tabSales Invoice`.name as 'Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:100',
	`tabSales Invoice`.customer_name as 'Customer:Link/Customer:400',
	tabCustomer.customer_code as 'Customer Code:Text:100',
	`tabSales Invoice`.posting_date as 'Posting Date:Date:120',
	`tabSales Invoice`.currency as 'Invoice Currency:Text:50',
	(case when `tabSales Invoice`.is_return then GL.credit * -1 else GL.debit end) as 'Cost of Sales (USD):Currency:120',
	`tabSales Invoice`.base_net_total as 'Income Excl. VAT (USD):Currency:120',
	`tabSales Invoice`.base_total as 'Income Incl. VAT (USD):Currency:120',
	rate.rate as 'Rate (Auction/Exchange):Int:60',
	(case when `tabSales Invoice`.is_return then (GL.credit * rate.rate) * -1 else (GL.debit * rate.rate) end) as 'Cost of Sales (RTGS):Currency:120',
	(`tabSales Invoice`.base_net_total * rate.rate) as 'Income Excl. VAT (RTGS):Currency:120',
	(`tabSales Invoice`.base_total * rate.rate) as 'Income Incl. VAT (RTGS):Currency:120'
from
	`tabSales Invoice`
left join
	tabCustomer on tabCustomer.name = `tabSales Invoice`.customer 
join
	(select
		parent invoice,
		delivery_note
	from
		`tabSales Invoice Item`
	where
		item_code is not null
	group by
		invoice) as link on `tabSales Invoice`.name = link.invoice
left join
	(select
		voucher_no,
		sum(debit) debit,
		sum(credit) credit
	from
		`tabGL Entry`
	where
		account like "%%Cost of Sales%%" and voucher_type = "Delivery Note"
	group by
		voucher_no) as GL on GL.voucher_no = link.delivery_note
join
	(select
		name invoice,
		(case when currency = "USD" then auction_bid_rate else 1 / conversion_rate end) rate
	from
		`tabSales Invoice`) as rate on rate.invoice = `tabSales Invoice`.name 
where
	`tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1 and
	(case when %(start_date)s is not null then `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date >= %(start_date)s end) and
	`tabSales Invoice`.posting_date <= %(end_date)s
order by
	`tabSales Invoice`.name desc
